doc.field: Richards, Grant, 1872-1948 [9 Henrietta St., London], Three Letters and Nine Postcards to [all signed]. Contents: eleven of these [2 ltrs, 9 postcards] pertain to EC's desire to have GR publish his The Story of Eros and Psyche; the 12th item [ltr, May 10, 1901] pertains to EC's desire to have GR publish his Iolaus: an Anthology of Friendship
